_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / Great God in Trinity
Subjects: carols, to Trinity; Trinity, carols to
_description: A carol to the Trinity — three quatrains and burden: ‘Qui natus est de virgine / Saluum me fac domine’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
ffader & son and holy gostgret god in
                    trinite…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…As þu dyd dy for man sakSaluum me fac
                    [domine]
